org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.util

Class PackageToolPopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.util.PackageToolPopup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<Boolean>, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>, javafx.event.EventTarget, CssConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProgressDialogPopup, WarningPopup

    public class PackageToolPopup
extends javafx.stage.Stage
implements CssConstants, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>, javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<Boolean>
    A helper class that creates a popup with a uniform look for the entire application. The popup is a simple border pane that contains a title header, a content section and then controls in the footer. All sections are optional however a header title and content should be set. Default properties are for the popup to auto hide and auto fix.
